item.description:
On Saturday, Oct. 20th, Boston Rotaract is gonna wander around the Corn Maize at Schartner Farm in Bolton, MA! Apple picking is also on the table, but at your own cost. Afterward, we'll probably celebrate with cider donuts. It's gonna be great.

More details: we've got ten tickets already paid for, after which tickets are $7 each. Please confirm with me if you will be attending and I'll reserve a ticket for you (you can email me at bayliss.william@gmail.com).

ALSO, please let me know if you are willing to serve as a driver, or are gonna need transportation, or are gonna get there on your own. So far, Caitlyn and I have committed to driving people. We're going to try to leave earlier in the day so we have plenty of time for apple picking after the maze.

http://www.schartnerfarm.com/
Schartner Farm:
279 West Berlin Road, Bolton MA 01740

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Corn Maize
